 Very clear Frank, heard them plus=C2=A0 other people talking. sf

 



---=
--Original Message-----
From: Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...&=
gt;
To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.com; RTSC@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thu, Jul 8, 201=
0 12:59 pm
Subject: [EVP-ITC] TRF--manual [1 Attachment]

          =C2=A0 =
                                           [Attachment(s) from Frank Sumpti=
on included below]                       
=C2=A0TRF=3Dtuned radio frequency=
. The kind of radio that was in use when radio was first invented. There is=
 a modern chip version, it has three pins and is very simple to set up. TRF=
 has the advantage of less noise and static, but in a box the stations tend=
 to over lap, but it still can give good results. It's the same radio in ea=
rlier version of the Mini box, and Chapple also used=C2=A0it in one of his =
projects. I have found it's best to wind the coil and tweak it to the radio=
 by removing tunrs until it covers the AM band. I start with 70 turns of wi=
re, the remove five at a time--or you could just wind sixty turns and leave=
 it at that, but being anal I tend to over do it. 
  =C2=A0
 =C2=A0At 3 sec=
onds "April, that gorgeous (capsule)", at 6 seconds "break it up", and 11 s=
econds "that woman-talk to Hultay".
 =C2=A0
 =C2=A0F-S
 
      
           =
      
   
       
  


----------MB_8CCECDB460A4BF4_2F94_2F92_Webmail-m112.sysops.aol.com

t">                               <span style=3D"font-weight: 700; font-siz=
e: 12px; display: block; margin-bottom: 20px;">[<a style=3D"text-decoration=
: none;" target=3D"_blank" href=3D"#TopText">Attachment(s)</a> from Frank S=
umption included below]</span>                       
<div></div>

<div>&nb=
sp;TRF=3Dtuned radio frequency. The kind of radio that was in use when radi=
o was first invented. There is a modern chip version, it has three pins and=
 is very simple to set up. TRF has the advantage of less noise and static, =
but in a box the stations tend to over lap, but it still can give good resu=
lts. It's the same radio in earlier version of the Mini box, and Chapple al=
so used it in one of his projects. I have found it's best to wind the =
coil and tweak it to the radio by removing tunrs until it covers the AM ban=
d. I start with 70 turns of wire, the remove five at a time--or you could j=
ust wind sixty turns and leave it at that, but being anal I tend to over do=
 it. </div>
  
<div> </div>
 
<div> At 3 seconds "April, that gor=
geous (capsule)", at 6 seconds "break it up", and 11 seconds "that woman-ta=
lk to Hultay".</div>
 
<div> </div>
 
<div> F-S</div>
 
<div></di=
v>
